desc: Find yourself wondering when you'll drink another Irn-Bru? Or when you'll eat your next good (like actually good) chocolate bar? We are hear to make your British Food Dreams come true! Whether you're a Brit living in the US, or just simply an American who LOVES them some British goodies, you're in the right place!

layout.text: All orders placed by 5pm Tuesday will be prepared for the next Thursday unless otherwise discussed. Cake orders do not apply. However we do need a minimum of 4 days notice, and ideally 2 weeks prior notice to ensure we are not fully booked.
